definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Tian1 zhu3 jiao4 Ai4 guo2 hui4
Zhong1 guo2 Min2 zhu3 Jian4 guo2 hui4

definition: chair (or president, speaker etc) of national congress

sentences.english: This congressman is clever at making scores off hecklers at public meetings.
sentences.chinese: 这位国会议员擅长在公众集会上驳倒诘难者。

sentences.english: S. senator. In Congress, Johnson was a strong advocate of America's westward expansion.
sentences.chinese: 在国会里，强森大力支持美国向西部扩张的计画。

sentences.english: The president's left-of-centre programme threatens to polarise Congress.
sentences.chinese: 总统的激进计划使国会发生了两极分化。

sentences.english: PARLIAMENT】Parliament is the lawmaking group in Great Britain.
sentences.chinese: 国会在英国是立法团体。

sentences.english: Congress has a moral and legal obligation to oversee institutions it brings into existence.
sentences.chinese: 国会有道义上和法律上的责任来监督它所建立的机构。

sentences.english: Japan's parliament has passed legislation to upgrade the country's defense agency into a full ministry.
sentences.chinese: 日本国会通过议案，将日本防卫厅升级为省。

sentences.english: An anti-nuclear demonstrator protest in Parliament Square in London March 14, 2007.
sentences.chinese: 英国伦敦国会广场前抗议的反核示威者。

sentences.english: Congress also is looking into the safety of regional airlines that fly the 30- to 90-seat planes.
sentences.chinese: 国会也正在调查区域性航空公司的安全问题。

sentences.english: But he accepted the cabinet's advice. He did not send his message to Congress.
sentences.chinese: 但他还是接受了内阁的建议，未将报文公之于国会。

sentences.english: We need to stop letting our Congress and the President get away withthe crimes their getting away with.
sentences.chinese: 不要再让国会和总统逃脱出他们该受到的制裁。

sentences.english: As always, presidential unilateralism puts Congress in a tough position.
sentences.chinese: 总统的单方面决定总是置国会与难堪的境地。

sentences.english: The new government will then deliver its policy statement before parliament.
sentences.chinese: 然后，新政府将在国会之前递交其政策声明。

sentences.english: Eighteen sixty-two was a congressional election year.
USCG missions are clearly defined in 'legal authorities' by the US Congress.
sentences.chinese: 美国国会以法定形式清楚地定义了USCG的使命。

sentences.english: And they deserve the full support of Congress.
sentences.chinese: 他们应该得到国会的全力支持。

definition: lower house of bicameral assembly/House of Representatives (USA)/Chamber of Deputies
abbr. for 參議院|参议院[can1 yi4 yuan4], senate/upper chamber (of legislative assembly)
member of the US House of Representatives
